Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2008 04:37AM monalisa wrote: Well good on you.   8 years of hell and you still have a positive attitude in that your were able to spend time with family etc.  You are only human to make decision on treatment...it's so individual and a hard decision.....we would all like to say"no I don't won't to do it" but we know that perhaps ....there is hope!  Who really knows.  I love your mad/sad comments....it really is that way.  I admire your fighting spirit!!!!
